resources.string: Hashtag Generator
Hello blank fragment
Write something here...
Search
Choose Theme
Light
Dark
System default
Choose Platform
You can use up to 30 hashtags on Instagram, and we suggest using all of them as they can be hidden within the caption.
Instagram stories allows 10 hashtags at most. We recommend using 10 hashtags as they can be hidden by making them look smaller in the story.
TikTok allows 120 characters at most. We recommend using 5–8 most related hashtags in your TikTok video caption as best practice.
Twitter allows 280 characters at most. We recommend using 3–5 most related hashtags per tweet as best practice
YouTube allows 15 hashtags at most. YouTube warns that over-tagging will remove your video from search. We recommend using 3 most related hashtags in the title.
Facebook allows as many hashtags as you want. We recommend using 2–5 most related hashtags. Too many hashtags won\'t look good on a Facebook post.
Linkedin allows as many hashtags as you want. We recommend using 5–8 most related hashtags. Too many hashtags won\'t look good on a LinkedIn post.
Pinterest allows 20 hashtags at most. We recommend using 5–8 most related hashtags on your pins as best practice.
Hashtags on snapchat works as a topic on spotlight. Although you can add many hashtags, we recommend adding 2–3 most related hashtags in spotlight.
Select the separator you want to use to separate the hashtags

This is the initial release of the app.So it many contain many bugs that needs to be addressed. You can report the bugs you notice through the REPORT BUGS card or contact me through the contact me section in playstore. It will help the app to be more optimized.
